about.details:
Incorporated in 1992, Ahmedabad based Vinny Overseas Limited is a company engaged in the business of processing of clothing fabrics. It procures Grey Fabric from the market and dyes the same as per the client's requirements. It is also engaged in Job-Work for wholesale cloth merchants and trades in grey cloth.

Vinny Overseas caters to both domestic and international clients and has been recognized as a "One Star Export House" by Director General of Foreign Trade, Ministry of Commerce and Industry.

In 2018, the company exported its products to 5 countries including UAE,
Iraq, Bahrain, Panama City and Sri Lanka. The revenue from exports constitutes approx. 6.20% of the total revenue of the company.

The company's processing unit with a capacity of processing 4,00,00,000 meter per annum is located at Ahmedabad.

The compnay has 76 employees on payroll and 143 contract workers.

faqs.question: What is the Vinny Overseas IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vinny Overseas IPO is a SME IPO of 2596000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.38 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2018, and closes on October 3, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vinny Overseas IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vinny Overseas IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vinny Overseas IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vinny Overseas IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vinny Overseas IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Vinny Overseas IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Vinny Overseas IPO opens on September 28, 2018 and closes on October 3, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vinny Overseas IPO?
faqs.answer: Vinny Overseas IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vinny Overseas IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vinny Overseas IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
